usage.cn: 曾经以为念念不忘的东西，总有一天会变得面目全非。
usage.eng: Things once thought never forget one day will look completely different.

usage.cn: ——因为你的与众不同，因为你的特别，有时候你得习惯孤独
usage.eng: When you're different…when you're special…sometimes you have to get used to being alone.

usage.cn: 君子并非定要远庖厨，做汉堡也不意味着折损尊严。你的祖父母对之另有解释，他们将之称为机遇。
usage.eng: Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a different word for burger flipping - they called it opportunity.

usage.cn: 不同的时间，不同的地点，不同的人群，相同的只有你和我；时间在变，空间在变，不变的只有对你无限的思念！
usage.eng: You and I remains the same in different time, at different places,among different people; time is changing, space is changing and everything is changing except my miss to you!
